atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Check the tree is the end of compound declaration.

xhtml:div.ns0:description: Check whether tree is part of compound declaration.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Check the tree is the end of compound declaration.

xhtml:div.ns1:description: Check the tree end with comma.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.diff] Show compact diff with netbeans.diff.default.compact system property

xhtml:div.ns2:description: Added the system property netbeans.diff.default.compact which instructs the default DiffControllerProvider to show only the graphical diff (instead of the tabbed pane with the graphical and textual diffs).

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Check the var type variable in given tree path.

xhtml:div.ns3:description: Added BuildArtifactMapper.isCompileOnSaveSupported method, which checks if compile on save is suported in the current configuration.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Check the var type variable in given tree path.

xhtml:div.ns4:description: Check the var type variable in given tree path.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.spi.java.hints] Added JavaFixUtilities.isPrimary() utility

ns5:description.p: The utility method JavaFixUtilities.isPrimary() was added. This API checks whether a specified tree can be used in places where a Primary expression is required.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.htmlui] CSS for Look and Feel
[org.netbeans.core.network] PAC Script evaluation environment is now pluggable

ns7:description.p: The PAC Script Evaluation environment (as part of ProxySelector) has been completely rewritten and is now pluggable. (albeit for now only for friends)

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.visual] States for non-registered objects

ns8:description.p: When the scene is incrementally rendered, it may be possible that a model object becomes selected before some widgets are registered with the scene. Hover, select, focus flags can be attached even to unregistered objects.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.spi.editor.hints] Provide a way to have fixable annotation with default action

xhtml:div.ns9:description: For custom type of annotations will dynamically register this annotation type as fixable, so Fix action (click on the icon) will work for it

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.spi.editor.hints] Support multiple ranges for ErrorDescriptor

xhtml:div.ns10:description: Added support for multiple ranges for error/warning. New field added to ErrorDescription as well as corresponding getter method and new constructor in order to be able to provide multiple ranges support for highlight particular hint. Added new factory method to ErrorDescriptionFactory which uses new ErrorDescription constructor.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.apache.tools.ant.module] Added a method to mark an execution as user / non-user into the AntTargetExecutor.Env

ns12:description.p: Added a method AntTargetExecutor.Env.setUserActionto mark an execution as user / non-user. The executions marked as user actions are registered in the UI support org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.support.BuildExecutionSupport. By default the execution is an user action.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.openide.windows] Allow to select Mode for opening a TopComponent instance

ns13:description.p: Plugin implementors can direct to-be-opened TopComponents to appropriate Modes or prevent them to open in inappropriate Modes.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.apache.tools.ant.module] Added methods to override the default tab replacement policy into the AntTargetExecutor.Env

ns15:description.p: When the IDE is set to the automatic close tabs mode the tabs created by the previous run of the AntTargetExecutor are closed by successive run. Added a support to override this behavior.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.platform] Added a isValid method into JavaPlatform

ns18:description.p: Added a isValid method into JavaPlatform to check platform validity. The platform is non valid when it's deleted or an platform tool (java, javac) is missing or bootstrap libraries are missing.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.sendopts] Command line with instances

xhtml:div.ns19:description: Create command line with instances of OptionProcessor and ArgsProcessor.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.templates] Support for decorating the creation process

ns20:description.p: In addition to provide CreateFromTemplateHandler which overtakes the template processing, CreateFromTemplateDecorator can participate in file creation doing pre- and post-creation tasks and edits either in the created file or other files.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.sendopts] Print Usage into Caller's Stream

xhtml:div.ns21:description: Env.usage method now takes an optional OutputStream parameter.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.sendopts] Explictly specify option processors

xhtml:div.ns22:description: CommandLine.html.create(Class...) can now be called with classes that extend OptionProcessor.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project.ui] Extended the BrokenReferencesSupport.createPlatformVersionProblemProvider by the mininal source level supported by the project

xhtml:div.ns24:description: Extended the BrokenReferencesSupport.createPlatformVersionProblemProvider by the mininal source level supported by the project

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.project.ant] Support for source root grouping

ns25:description.p: A SourceRootConfig can be identifier by a structured "identifier" so when a new SourceGroup should be created as an associcate to existing sources, it is created in appropriate "sibling" location. See SourceGroupModifier for more details.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.projectapi] Added a SourceGroupRelativeModifierImplementation to improve source root creation

ns27:description.p: In presence of multiple source roots, e.g. several source folders, or test folders, some of them may be more related to the

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project] Added a SPI to manipulate with project's module-info.java declarations

xhtml:div.ns29:description: Added a SPI interface, which should be implemented on project to provide backwards compatibility for ProjectClassPathModifier for modular projects.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added factory method and interface to determine relationships between SourceGroups and modules

ns30:description.p: MultiModuleGroupQuery query interface allows to find out which module owns a particular SourceGroup. Project implementors can create an instance using new query method on QuerySupport.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added module-related properties to ProjectProperties

ns32:description.p: Added BUILD_TEST_MODULES_DIR to denote build location for tests in modular projects

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Added a method to create an ElementHandle for module

xhtml:div.ns34:description: Added a method to create a module ElementHandle from a module name.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.classfile] Introduced ModulePackages, ModuleMainClass, ModuleTarget attributes

xhtml:div.ns35:description: Introduced ModulePackages, ModuleMainClass, ModuleTarget attributes according to recent JDK 9 JLS

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.classfile] Updated ClassFile Module attribute to recent JDK 9 JLS

xhtml:div.ns36:description: Updated ClassFile to recent JDK 9 JLS.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.openide.util.ui] API NetworkSettings.getAuthenticationPassword added

ns38:description.p: The SPI NetworkSettings.ProxyCredentialsProvider allows NetBeans Platform users to provide proxy and network credentials, but the according API should also provide the password, not only the username.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.templates] Maven Archetypes

xhtml:div.ns39:description: One can now create project wizards that create new projects from Maven archetypes. See the how-to for more details.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda] Differentiate application-level exceptions

xhtml:div.ns40:description: InvalidExpressionException can be thrown as a result of an application-level exception. We need to differentiate this case from exceptions thrown from NetBeans code. A boolean argument in the constructor and a method hasApplicationTarget() are added to InvalidExpressionException for this purpose.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.java] Added constants for module paths into the JavaClassPathConstants

ns42:description.p: Added constants for module paths into the JavaClassPathConstants.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.java] Added AccessibilityQueryImplementation2 to allow to listen on package accessibility changes

ns44:description.p: Added AccessibilityQueryImplementation2 interface and AccessibilityQuery.isPubliclyAccessible2 method to allow to listen on package accessibility changes.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.java] Added CompilerOptionsQuery for additional compiler options

ns46:description.p: Added CompilerOptionsQuery for passing additional compiler options to java infrastructure.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.java.classpath] Added a ClassPath switching among several ClassPath instances

ns49:description.p: Added a factory method into ClassPathSupport creating a ClassPath switching among several ClassPath instances.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.classfile] Added isModule method into ClassFile

xhtml:div.ns50:description: Added isModule method into a ClassFile to test that a classfile represents a module descriptor.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.classfile] Support for Java 9 Module attribute

xhtml:div.ns51:description: Java 9 added a Module attribute for module-info.class describing the module.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.j2seproject] Added a method to create default module properties

xhtml:div.ns52:description: Added a method into the J2SEProjectBuilder to create default module properties for J2SEProject.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project] Added a LookupMerger for CompilerOptionsQueryImplementations

xhtml:div.ns55:description: Added a factory method LookupMergerSupport.createCompilerOptionsQueryMerger to create a LookupMerger for CompilerOptionsQueryImplementations instances.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project.ui] Added a constant for execute module path into JavaRunner

xhtml:div.ns57:description: Added a constant PROP_EXECUTE_MODULEPATH for execute module path into JavaRunner.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project.ui] Allows to extend the New Java File Wizard by project specific panels

xhtml:div.ns58:description: Allows to extend the New Java File Wizard by project specific panels.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Added methods to generate/modify the module-info.java files

xhtml:div.ns59:description: Added methods to generate/modify the module-info.java files

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Added an information about changes in the module-info

xhtml:div.ns60:description: Added an information about changes in the module-info.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.sourceui] Adding ElementOpen.open(FileObject toSearch, TreePathHandle toOpen)

xhtml:div.ns61:description: Adding ElementOpen.open(FileObject toSearch, TreePathHandle toOpen) method.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.sourceui] Added a method to return an icon for module info directive

xhtml:div.ns62:description: Added thegetModuleDirectiveIcon method into the ElementIcons to return an icon for a module info directive.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Platform combobox handles per project platforms

ns63:description.p: Platform combobox created by PlatformUiSupport handles per project JavaPlatforms.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Boot ClassPath uses JavaPlatform defined in project

ns64:description.p: Boot ClassPath created by ClassPathProviderImpl uses a JavaPlatform defined in project.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.platform] Added a SPI to create new JavaPlatform

ns65:description.p: Added a SPI allowing JavaPlatform implementors to export ability to create a new JavaPlatform.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.project] Added a support for per project JavaPlatform

ns66:description.p: Added a support for per project JavaPlatform. The usecase for the per project JavaPlatform is a generated project. The project generator puts platform path into the project properties and the generated projects have correct JavaPlatform. There is no need to resolve broken JavaPlatform when the projects are opened.
To use the per project JavaPlatform set the platform.active property to the platform name and add the platforms.<platform_name>.home property pointing to the path to the JDK home.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.codetemplates] Added ordering for code template parameters.
[org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Added category to EditorActionRegistration

ns69:description.p: Allow to set the keymap-category for an action registered using @EditorActionRegistration.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] List elements with their definining Scope

xhtml:div.ns70:description: Allows to enumerate Elements matching passed ElementFilter according to hiding and inheritance rules. The method may be useful to list elements matching certain criteria, or to check whether an element exists and find what class/method defined it.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Position.Bias support added to EditorCaret

ns71:description.p: CaretInfo.getDotBias() and CaretInfo.getMarkBias() added together with other methods and parameters for bias manipulation to properly handle bidirectional text.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.hints.test] Assertion for missing fixes

xhtml:div.ns72:description: A method assertFixesNotPresent was added to easily detect that fix is gone if e.g. some precondition is not met.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi.base] Added a support method into ProjectConvertors creating a Lookup delegating to the owner project.

ns75:description.p: Added a support method into ProjectConvertors creating a Lookup delegating to the owner project.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Renamed ShiftHighlightsSequence to SplitOffsetHighlightsSequence

ns76:description.p: Renamed ShiftHighlightsSequence to SplitOffsetHighlightsSequence to and its getStartShift() to getStartSplitOffset() for better description and getEndShift() to getEndSplitOffset().

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added a factory method into QuerySupportto create a module-info based AccessibilityQueryImplementation2 instance

ns79:description.p: Added a factory method into QuerySupportto create a module-info based AccessibilityQueryImplementation2 instance.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Provide type suitable for declaration in source

xhtml:div.ns80:description: Support method which allows to infer a type suitable for use in symbol declaration in the source was added.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Allow to return also unimplemented default methods

ns81:description.p: findUnimplementedMethods and findOverridableMethods work better with interface default methods: they are treated as implemented, but overridable.
Allow ElementUtilities.findUnimplementedMethods enumerate also default methods whose implementations are not provided by class or superclasses.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] EditorUtilities.addCaretUndoableEdit added

ns82:description.p: EditorUtilities.addCaretUndoableEdit allows actions to remember caret position during an atomic transaction over a document.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.debugger] API for pinned Watches

xhtml:div.ns83:description: A Watch.Pin base interface introduced as a basis for specific platform-dependent and location-dependent implementations. DebuggerManager.createPinnedwatch() introduced.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Support for sticky windows in the editor

ns84:description.p: Support for Sticky Windows in the editor. JComponents can be added to a layer on top of the editor. Components will update their vertical position on editor changes.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Support for Navigation Filters, and caret move origins

ns85:description.p: Swing NavigationFilters implemented on top of the Caret API. Caret API caller may describe the operation which causes the caret to be moved, so that filters and caret listeners can react on specific action groups.
A boilerplate NavigationFilter is provided, that supports chaining of filters on the caret

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Added EditorRegistry.findComponent

ns86:description.p: The EditorRegistry.findComponent() allows caret related undo edits to be undone in a focused component (for multiple views over a single document).
Also simplified naming of EditorActionNames.addCaretUp and addCaretDown.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added a factory method into QuerySupportto create unit tests CompilerOptionsQueryImplementation provider

ns89:description.p: Added a factory method into QuerySupportto create an implementation of the CompilerOptionsQueryImplementation providing explicit compiler options for tests compilation based on the source level and module-infos in source and test roots.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added a factory method into QuerySupportto createCompilerOptionsQueryImplementation provider

ns92:description.p: Added a factory method into QuerySupportto create an Ant property based implementation of the CompilerOptionsQueryImplementation.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common] Added modulepath properties into the ProjectProperties

ns94:description.p: Added constants holding the modulepath property names into theProjectProperties. The following constants were added JAVAC_MODULEPATH, JAVAC_TEST_MODULEPATH, RUN_MODULEPATH,RUN_TEST_MODULEPATH, DEBUG_MODULEPATH,DEBUG_TEST_MODULEPATH.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Caret API introduced

ns95:description.p: The Caret API was introduced to allow working with multiple carets within one document.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Extended HightlightsSequence by ShiftHighlightsSequence

ns96:description.p: Highlights sequence that supports shifts in addition to regular offsets. This allows to color individual spaces within a tab character or to color extra virtual characters beyond a newline character.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.util] Added methods to append elements to a GapList

xhtml:div.ns97:description: Added supplementary methods to GapList to accompany the existing methods to add elements.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.openide.nodes] Adding ChildFactory.Detachable to allow ChildFactory implementations to attach and detach listeners more easily

xhtml:div.ns98:description:
ChildFactory is useful for creating node children lazily on a background thread, and for simplifying working with Children.Keys. One oversight in the original API was providing for notification that the nodes created by the ChildFactory are no longer in use and should clean up any resources.
DestroyableNodesFactory is an abstract class which adds destroyNodes methods to ChildFactory.Detachable.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.guards] Allow to protect existing text

xhtml:div.ns99:description: Added method to create guarded block on top of existing text.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2] Added IDs for goto prev/next occurrence actions

ns100:description.p: Many languages define their own actions and support for navigating between symbol occurrences. Common action name allows them to be presented and configured as one action in IDE configuration.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda] Enhanced smart-stepping.

xhtml:div.ns101:description: SmartSteppingCallback.stopAt() method added to be able to override the default smart-stepping logic and provide specific steps that should be performed at given locations.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.openide.loaders] Introduces SortMode for natural sorting.

ns102:description.p: Added support for natural sorting of DataObjects. This means that the sort is case insensitive and number sequences are sorted by value rather than lexicographically.

atom:title.xhtml:div: [org.netbeans.modules.java.source.base] Code Generator uses caret location to insert members

xhtml:div.ns103:description: Added an overloaded method to Code Generator should to include the caret location when inserting members. This will be used when the codestyle is CodeStyle.InsertionPoint.CARET_LOCATION.
